title: Xfinity TV Offers Bollywood Movies in HD and Special Freeview

In honor of Diwali, select HD Bollywood films available to Xfinity customers free, November 3-9
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- International Media Distribution (IMD) and Eros International are happy to announce that Eros Now On Demand high definition titles will be available to Xfinity TV customers for free from November 3 rd through November 9 th in honor of Diwali, known as the Festival of Lights and biggest holiday among South Asians. In addition to offering HD titles to Xfinity customers for the first time, Eros Now will be unlocking its full program lineup on Xfinity On Demand in celebration of the Indian holiday.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151019/278249
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151019/278250LOGO
The HD titles that will be available on November 3rd are:
Ready Chalte Chalte Vicky Donor Parineeta These titles can be accessed by selecting the Xfinity on Demand menu, then "Premium Channels," "Eros Now," as well as through the main menu via "Multicultural" and then "Bollywood Free."
All titles on Eros Now On Demand are in Hindi, subtitled in English for all audiences to enjoy. To access Eros Now On Demand, customers should consult the Xfinity On Demand menu or visit www.erosnowondemand.com for more information.
About IMD
International Media Distribution (IMD) has been a leading provider of in-language programming in the U.S. for nearly two decades. IMD represents more than 30 TV services with content from a variety of international sources. About Eros International :
Eros is an integrated player in the rapidly growing Indian media and entertainment sector, involved in the acquisition and distribution of filmed entertainment content across current and emerging formats including theatres, home entertainment, television and new media.
Established in 1977 with a vision to become the gateway for Indian content worldwide and Hollywood content in India , Eros has over three decades of market experience in creating a global platform for Indian cinema. In 2006, Eros became the first Indian media company to obtain a listing on the AIM Market of the London Stock Exchange. Eros operates in five continents and over 50 countries with offices throughout India , the United Kingdom , USA , UAE, Singapore , Australia , Fiji and the Isle of Man . For further information please visit: www.erosplc.com
